---
title: "The Comprehensive Guide to Lash Extensions"
excerpt: "Everything you need to know about lash extensions, trends, and professional insights."
coverImage: "/assets/blog/preview/cover.jpg"
date: "2024-12-12T05:35:07.322Z"
author:
  name: Hang
  picture: "/assets/blog/authors/hang.png"
ogImage:
  url: "/assets/blog/preview/cover.jpg"
---
## The Comprehensive Guide to Lash Extensions

Lash extensions have become a popular beauty trend, offering a way to enhance the length and volume of natural lashes. This guide will provide you with everything you need to know about lash extensions, including the different types, application techniques, and aftercare tips.

### Types of Lash Extensions

1. **Classic Lash Extensions**: These are individual lashes applied to each natural lash, providing a natural look.
2. **Volume Lash Extensions**: Multiple lightweight lashes are applied to each natural lash, creating a fuller and more dramatic effect.
3. **Hybrid Lash Extensions**: A mix of classic and volume techniques, offering a balanced look.

### Application Techniques

The application of lash extensions should always be performed by a trained professional to ensure safety and optimal results. The process typically involves:

- A consultation to determine the desired look.
- Preparation of the natural lashes.
- Application of the extensions using a specialized adhesive.

### Trends in Lash Extensions

As the beauty industry evolves, so do the trends in lash extensions. Some current trends include:

- **Colored Lash Extensions**: Adding a pop of color to your lashes for a fun and unique look.
- **Lash Lifts**: A treatment that curls and lifts natural lashes without extensions, providing a more natural enhancement.

### Professional Insights

To maintain the longevity of your lash extensions, proper aftercare is essential. Here are some tips:

- Avoid water and steam for the first 24 hours after application.
- Use oil-free makeup removers.
- Schedule regular touch-ups every 2-3 weeks to keep your lashes looking their best.

At HA Beauty Lashes, we are committed to providing our clients with the best lash extension services and education. Our goal is to help you achieve stunning, effortless beauty that lasts.

File: _posts/nails.md
================
---
title: "The Art of Nail Design"
excerpt: "Discover the rich history and business origins of nail design."
coverImage: "/assets/blog/preview/cover.jpg"
date: "2024-12-14T05:35:07.322Z"
author:
  name: Hang
  picture: "/assets/blog/authors/hang.png"
ogImage:
  url: "/assets/blog/preview/cover.jpg"
---

Nail design has a rich history that dates back thousands of years, with its origins rooted in ancient civilizations.  The art of nail design has evolved significantly over the years, influenced by cultural trends, fashion, and technological advancements. 

In ancient Egypt, both men and women adorned their nails with henna, a practice that symbolized wealth and status. The use of nail polish can be traced back to the Ming Dynasty in China, where a mixture of beeswax, egg whites, and colored powders was used to create beautiful nail colors.

As the centuries progressed, nail design became more sophisticated. The introduction of modern nail polish in the 20th century revolutionized the industry, allowing for a wider variety of colors and finishes. Today, nail design is not just a beauty trend but a form of self-expression, with techniques ranging from simple manicures to intricate nail art.

At HA Beauty, we celebrate the art of nail design by offering a range of services that highlight the beauty and creativity of our clients. Our skilled technicians are trained in the latest techniques and trends, ensuring that every client leaves feeling beautiful and confident.

import Container from "@/app/_components/container";
import { EXAMPLE_PATH } from "@/lib/constants";
import cn from "classnames";

type Props = {
  preview?: boolean;
};

const Alert = ({ preview }: Props) => {
  return (
    <div
      className={cn("border-b dark:bg-slate-800", {
        "bg-neutral-800 border-neutral-800 text-white": preview,
        "bg-neutral-50 border-neutral-200": !preview,
      })}
    >
      <Container>
        <div className="py-2 text-center text-sm">
          {preview ? (
            <>
              This page is a preview.{" "}
              <a
                href="/api/exit-preview"
                className="underline hover:text-teal-300 duration-200 transition-colors"
              >
                Click here
              </a>{" "}
              to exit preview mode.
            </>
          ) : (
            <>
              The source code for this blog is{" "}
              <a
                href={`https://github.com/vercel/next.js/tree/canary/examples/${EXAMPLE_PATH}`}
                className="underline hover:text-blue-600 duration-200 transition-colors"
              >
                available on GitHub
              </a>
              .
            </>
          )}
        </div>
      </Container>
    </div>
  );
};

export default Alert;

import cn from "classnames";
import Link from "next/link";
import Image from "next/image";

type Props = {
  title: string;
  src: string;
  slug?: string;
};

const CoverImage = ({ title, src, slug }: Props) => {
  const image = (
    <Image
      src={src}
      alt={`Cover Image for ${title}`}
      className={cn("shadow-sm w-full", {
        "hover:shadow-lg transition-shadow duration-200": slug,
      })}
      width={1300}
      height={630}
    />
  );
  return (
    <div className="sm:mx-0">
      {slug ? (
        <Link href={`/posts/${slug}`} aria-label={title}>
          {image}
        </Link>
      ) : (
        image
      )}
    </div>
  );
};

export default CoverImage;

import { parseISO, format } from "date-fns";

type Props = {
  dateString: string;
};

const DateFormatter = ({ dateString }: Props) => {
  const date = parseISO(dateString);
  return <time dateTime={dateString}>{format(date, "LLLL	d, yyyy")}</time>;
};

export default DateFormatter;

import Avatar from "@/app/_components/avatar";
import CoverImage from "@/app/_components/cover-image";
import { type Author } from "@/interfaces/author";
import Link from "next/link";
import DateFormatter from "./date-formatter";

type Props = {
  title: string;
  coverImage: string;
  date: string;
  excerpt: string;
  author: Author;
  slug: string;
};

export function HeroPost({
  title,
  coverImage,
  date,
  excerpt,
  author,
  slug,
}: Props) {
  return (
    <section>
      <div className="mb-8 md:mb-16">
        <CoverImage title={title} src={coverImage} slug={slug} />
      </div>
      <div className="md:grid md:grid-cols-2 md:gap-x-16 lg:gap-x-8 mb-20 md:mb-28">
        <div>
          <h3 className="mb-4 text-4xl lg:text-5xl leading-tight">
            <Link href={`/posts/${slug}`} className="hover:underline">
              {title}
            </Link>
          </h3>
          <div className="mb-4 md:mb-0 text-lg">
            <DateFormatter dateString={date} />
          </div>
        </div>
        <div>
          <p className="text-lg leading-relaxed mb-4">{excerpt}</p>
          <Avatar name={author.name} picture={author.picture} />
        </div>
      </div>
    </section>
  );
}

import { remark } from ""remark"";
import html from ""remark-html"";

export default async function markdownToHtml(markdown: string) {
  const result = await remark().use(html).process(markdown);
  return result.toString();
}

# Issue Title: Update Typography and Design Elements in `layout.tsx` and `cover-image.tsx` to Replace Font, Modify Colors, and Add Rounded Corners to Images

## Objective:

Update the typography and design elements by replacing the font, modifying layout colors, and adding rounded corners to images. This will enhance the overall user experience by improving readability and aesthetics.

## Story Context:

The current website uses the Inter font, which will be replaced with Quicksand to match a more modern and playful design language for users. Layout colors need to be updated for better contrast, and cover images should have rounded corners for a more contemporary and cohesive appearance. These changes will ensure users have a visually pleasing and accessible experience.

## Technical Requirements:

- **Framework:** Next.js
- **Styling:** Tailwind CSS
- **Language:** TypeScript

## Codebase Changes:

### 1. Modify `layout.tsx`:

- Replace the Inter font with Quicksand by importing it using `next/font/google` and replacing Inter throughout the file.
- Update the background and text colors to the following Tailwind CSS classes:
    - **Background:** `dark:bg-rose-900`
    - **Text:** `dark:text-pink-200`

### 2. Modify `cover-image.tsx`:

- Apply rounded corners to images using Tailwind CSS classes such as `rounded-lg` or `rounded-xl`.

## Implementation Steps:

### 1. Modify `layout.tsx` to Replace Font and Update Colors:

- **Import Quicksand:**

```
import { Quicksand } from "next/font/google";
```

- Replace all instances of Inter with Quicksand in the code.
- Update the color scheme for the layout by adding Tailwind CSS classes:
    - Background: `dark:bg-rose-900'
    - Text: `dark:text-pink-200`

### 2. Modify `cover-image.tsx` to Add Rounded Corners:

- Locate the image element in `cover-image.tsx`.
- Update the `className` property to include rounded corners using Tailwind CSS classes like `rounded-lg` or `rounded-xl`, in addition to the existing ones (e.g., `shadow-sm w-full`), while maintaining the conditional logic for the slug.

## Acceptance Criteria:

- The font is successfully updated to Quicksand in `layout.tsx`.
- The background and text colors are updated to `dark:bg-rose-900` and `dark:text-pink-200`, respectively.
- Cover images in `cover-image.tsx` have rounded corners using Tailwind CSS classes.
- The website’s design is cohesive, responsive, and aligned with modern aesthetics.

## About HA Beauty Lashes

HA Beauty Lashes was established in 2020 in Glienicke Nordbahn, as an extension of the renowned Ha Beauty brand. Our journey began with a passion for enhancing natural beauty through expertly crafted lash extensions. Since our inception, we have dedicated ourselves to providing high-quality lash services that not only beautify but also empower our clients.

Our team of skilled professionals is trained in the latest techniques and trends in lash extensions, ensuring that every client receives personalized care and attention. We believe that every woman deserves to feel beautiful and confident, and our mission is to help them achieve that effortlessly.

At HA Beauty Lashes, we pride ourselves on our commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction. We continuously strive to innovate and improve our services, making us the go-to destination for lash extensions in Glienicke and beyond.

================
File: _posts/lash-extension.md
================
---
title: "The Transformative Power of Lash Extensions"
excerpt: "Explore the transformative power of lash extensions and how they enhance natural beauty."
coverImage: "/assets/blog/preview/cover.jpg"
date: "2024-12-14T05:35:07.322Z"
author:
  name: Hang
  picture: "/assets/blog/authors/hang.png"
ogImage:
  url: "/assets/blog/preview/cover.jpg"
---

Lash extensions have become a revolutionary beauty trend, offering women the opportunity to enhance their natural beauty effortlessly. Since their introduction, lash extensions have transformed the way women approach their beauty routines, providing a solution for those seeking longer, fuller lashes without the need for mascara.

There are several types of lash extensions available, each designed to cater to different preferences and styles:

1. **Classic Lash Extensions**: These involve applying a single extension to each natural lash, creating a natural and elegant look.
2. **Volume Lash Extensions**: This technique uses multiple lightweight extensions to create a fuller, more dramatic effect, perfect for those who desire a bolder look.
3. **Hybrid Lash Extensions**: A combination of classic and volume techniques, offering a balanced look that suits various eye shapes and styles.

At HA Beauty, we pride ourselves on our expertise in lash extensions. Our trained professionals ensure that each application is done with precision and care, allowing our clients to enjoy stunning, long-lasting results. We also provide essential aftercare tips to maintain the longevity of your lash extensions, ensuring that you can enjoy your beautiful lashes for weeks to come.

Our mission is to empower women through beauty, helping them feel confident and radiant with every blink.

## The Comprehensive Guide to Lash Extensions

Lash extensions have become a popular beauty trend, offering a way to enhance the length and volume of natural lashes. This guide will provide you with everything you need to know about lash extensions, including the different types, application techniques, and aftercare tips.

### Types of Lash Extensions

1. **Classic Lash Extensions**: These are individual lashes applied to each natural lash, providing a natural look.
2. **Volume Lash Extensions**: Multiple lightweight lashes are applied to each natural lash, creating a fuller and more dramatic effect.
3. **Hybrid Lash Extensions**: A mix of classic and volume techniques, offering a balanced look.

### Application Techniques

The application of lash extensions should always be performed by a trained professional to ensure safety and optimal results. The process typically involves:

- A consultation to determine the desired look.
- Preparation of the natural lashes.
- Application of the extensions using a specialized adhesive.

### Trends in Lash Extensions

As the beauty industry evolves, so do the trends in lash extensions. Some current trends include:

- **Colored Lash Extensions**: Adding a pop of color to your lashes for a fun and unique look.
- **Lash Lifts**: A treatment that curls and lifts natural lashes without extensions, providing a more natural enhancement.

### Professional Insights

To maintain the longevity of your lash extensions, proper aftercare is essential. Here are some tips:

- Avoid water and steam for the first 24 hours after application.
- Use oil-free makeup removers.
- Schedule regular touch-ups every 2-3 weeks to keep your lashes looking their best.

At HA Beauty Lashes, we are committed to providing our clients with the best lash extension services and education. Our goal is to help you achieve stunning, effortless beauty that lasts.

---
title: "The Art of Nail Design"
excerpt: "Discover the rich history and business origins of nail design."
coverImage: "/assets/blog/preview/cover.jpg"
date: "2024-12-14T05:35:07.322Z"
author:
  name: Hang
  picture: "/assets/blog/authors/hang.png"
ogImage:
  url: "/assets/blog/preview/cover.jpg"
---

Nail design has a rich history that dates back thousands of years, with its origins rooted in ancient civilizations.  The art of nail design has evolved significantly over the years, influenced by cultural trends, fashion, and technological advancements. 

In ancient Egypt, both men and women adorned their nails with henna, a practice that symbolized wealth and status. The use of nail polish can be traced back to the Ming Dynasty in China, where a mixture of beeswax, egg whites, and colored powders was used to create beautiful nail colors.

As the centuries progressed, nail design became more sophisticated. The introduction of modern nail polish in the 20th century revolutionized the industry, allowing for a wider variety of colors and finishes. Today, nail design is not just a beauty trend but a form of self-expression, with techniques ranging from simple manicures to intricate nail art.

At HA Beauty, we celebrate the art of nail design by offering a range of services that highlight the beauty and creativity of our clients. Our skilled technicians are trained in the latest techniques and trends, ensuring that every client leaves feeling beautiful and confident.

import { Metadata } from "next";
import { notFound } from "next/navigation";
import { getAllPosts, getPostBySlug } from "@/lib/api";
import { CMS_NAME } from "@/lib/constants";
import markdownToHtml from "@/lib/markdownToHtml";
import Container from "@/app/_components/container";
import Header from "@/app/_components/header";
import { PostBody } from "@/app/_components/post-body";
import { PostHeader } from "@/app/_components/post-header";

export default async function Post(props: Params) {
  const params = await props.params;
  const post = getPostBySlug(params.slug);

  if (!post) {
    return notFound();
  }

  const content = await markdownToHtml(post.content || "");

  return (
    <main>
      <Container>
        <Header />
        <article className="mb-32">
          <PostHeader
            title={post.title}
            coverImage={post.coverImage}
            date={post.date}
            author={post.author}
          />
          <PostBody content={content} />
        </article>
      </Container>
    </main>
  );
}

import cn from "classnames";
import Link from "next/link";
import Image from "next/image";

type Props = {
  title: string;
  src: string;
  slug?: string;
};

const CoverImage = ({ title, src, slug }: Props) => {
  const image = (
    <Image
      src={src}
      alt={`Cover Image for ${title}`}
      className={cn("shadow-sm w-full", {
        "hover:shadow-lg transition-shadow duration-200": slug,
      })}
      width={1300}
      height={630}
    />
  );
  return (
    <div className="sm:mx-0">
      {slug ? (
        <Link href={`/posts/${slug}`} aria-label={title}>
          {image}
        </Link>
      ) : (
        image
      )}
    </div>
  );
};

export default CoverImage;

  dateString: string;

const DateFormatter = ({ dateString }: Props) => {

};

import { remark } from ""remark"";
import html from ""remark-html"";

export default async function markdownToHtml(markdown: string) {
  const result = await remark().use(html).process(markdown);
  return result.toString();
}

## Objective:

## Story Context:

### Issue Details:
Content of 'issue-description.txt':
# Issue Title: Update Typography and Design Elements in `layout.tsx` and `cover-image.tsx` to Replace Font, Modify Colors, and Add Rounded Corners to Images

## Objective:

Update the typography and design elements by replacing the font, modifying layout colors, and adding rounded corners to images. This will enhance the overall user experience by improving readability and aesthetics.

## Story Context:

The current website uses the Inter font, which will be replaced with Quicksand to match a more modern and playful design language for users. Layout colors need to be updated for better contrast, and cover images should have rounded corners for a more contemporary and cohesive appearance. These changes will ensure users have a visually pleasing and accessible experience.

## Technical Requirements:

- **Framework:** Next.js
- **Styling:** Tailwind CSS
- **Language:** TypeScript

## Codebase Changes:

### 1. Modify `layout.tsx`:

- Replace the Inter font with Quicksand by importing it using `next/font/google` and replacing Inter throughout the file.
- Update the background and text colors to the following Tailwind CSS classes:
    - **Background:** `dark:bg-rose-900`
    - **Text:** `dark:text-pink-200`

### 2. Modify `cover-image.tsx`:

- Apply rounded corners to images using Tailwind CSS classes such as `rounded-lg` or `rounded-xl`.

## Implementation Steps:

### 1. Modify `layout.tsx` to Replace Font and Update Colors:

- **Import Quicksand:**

```
import { Quicksand } from "next/font/google";
```

- Replace all instances of Inter with Quicksand in the code.
- Update the color scheme for the layout by adding Tailwind CSS classes:
    - Background: `dark:bg-rose-900'
    - Text: `dark:text-pink-200`

### 2. Modify `cover-image.tsx` to Add Rounded Corners:

- Locate the image element in `cover-image.tsx`.
- Update the `className` property to include rounded corners using Tailwind CSS classes like `rounded-lg` or `rounded-xl`, in addition to the existing ones (e.g., `shadow-sm w-full`), while maintaining the conditional logic for the slug.

## Acceptance Criteria:

- The font is successfully updated to Quicksand in `layout.tsx`.
- The background and text colors are updated to `dark:bg-rose-900` and `dark:text-pink-200`, respectively.
- Cover images in `cover-image.tsx` have rounded corners using Tailwind CSS classes.
- The website’s design is cohesive, responsive, and aligned with modern aesthetics.

## About HA Beauty Lashes

HA Beauty Lashes was established in 2020 in Glienicke Nordbahn, as an extension of the renowned Ha Beauty brand. Our journey began with a passion for enhancing natural beauty through expertly crafted lash extensions. Since our inception, we have dedicated ourselves to providing high-quality lash services that not only beautify but also empower our clients.

Our team of skilled professionals is trained in the latest techniques and trends in lash extensions, ensuring that every client receives personalized care and attention. We believe that every woman deserves to feel beautiful and confident, and our mission is to help them achieve that effortlessly.

At HA Beauty Lashes, we pride ourselves on our commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction. We continuously strive to innovate and improve our services, making us the go-to destination for lash extensions in Glienicke and beyond.

File: _posts/lash-extension.md

---
title: "The Transformative Power of Lash Extensions"
excerpt: "Explore the transformative power of lash extensions and how they enhance natural beauty."
coverImage: "/assets/blog/preview/cover.jpg"
date: "2024-12-14T05:35:07.322Z"
author:
  name: Hang
  picture: "/assets/blog/authors/hang.png"
ogImage:
  url: "/assets/blog/preview/cover.jpg"
---

Lash extensions have become a revolutionary beauty trend, offering women the opportunity to enhance their natural beauty effortlessly. Since their introduction, lash extensions have transformed the way women approach their beauty routines, providing a solution for those seeking longer, fuller lashes without the need for mascara.

There are several types of lash extensions available, each designed to cater to different preferences and styles:

1. **Classic Lash Extensions**: These involve applying a single extension to each natural lash, creating a natural and elegant look.
2. **Volume Lash Extensions**: This technique uses multiple lightweight extensions to create a fuller, more dramatic effect, perfect for those who desire a bolder look.
3. **Hybrid Lash Extensions**: A combination of classic and volume techniques, offering a balanced look that suits various eye shapes and styles.

At HA Beauty, we pride ourselves on our expertise in lash extensions. Our trained professionals ensure that each application is done with precision and care, allowing our clients to enjoy stunning, long-lasting results. We also provide essential aftercare tips to maintain the longevity of your lash extensions, ensuring that you can enjoy your beautiful lashes for weeks to come.

Our mission is to empower women through beauty, helping them feel confident and radiant with every blink.

================

---
title: "The Comprehensive Guide to Lash Extensions"
excerpt: "Everything you need to know about lash extensions, trends, and professional insights."
coverImage: "/assets/blog/preview/cover.jpg"
date: "2024-12-12T05:35:07.322Z"
author:
  name: Hang
  picture: "/assets/blog/authors/hang.png"
ogImage:
  url: "/assets/blog/preview/cover.jpg"
---
## The Comprehensive Guide to Lash Extensions

Lash extensions have become a popular beauty trend, offering a way to enhance the length and volume of natural lashes. This guide will provide you with everything you need to know about lash extensions, including the different types, application techniques, and aftercare tips.

### Types of Lash Extensions

1. **Classic Lash Extensions**: These are individual lashes applied to each natural lash, providing a natural look.
2. **Volume Lash Extensions**: Multiple lightweight lashes are applied to each natural lash, creating a fuller and more dramatic effect.
3. **Hybrid Lash Extensions**: A mix of classic and volume techniques, offering a balanced look.

### Application Techniques

The application of lash extensions should always be performed by a trained professional to ensure safety and optimal results. The process typically involves:

- A consultation to determine the desired look.
- Preparation of the natural lashes.
- Application of the extensions using a specialized adhesive.

### Trends in Lash Extensions

As the beauty industry evolves, so do the trends in lash extensions. Some current trends include:

- **Colored Lash Extensions**: Adding a pop of color to your lashes for a fun and unique look.
- **Lash Lifts**: A treatment that curls and lifts natural lashes without extensions, providing a more natural enhancement.

### Professional Insights

To maintain the longevity of your lash extensions, proper aftercare is essential. Here are some tips:

- Avoid water and steam for the first 24 hours after application.
- Use oil-free makeup removers.
- Schedule regular touch-ups every 2-3 weeks to keep your lashes looking their best.

At HA Beauty Lashes, we are committed to providing our clients with the best lash extension services and education. Our goal is to help you achieve stunning, effortless beauty that lasts.

================
File: _posts/nails.md
================
---
title: "The Art of Nail Design"
excerpt: "Discover the rich history and business origins of nail design."
coverImage: "/assets/blog/preview/cover.jpg"
date: "2024-12-14T05:35:07.322Z"
author:
  name: Hang
  picture: "/assets/blog/authors/hang.png"
ogImage:
  url: "/assets/blog/preview/cover.jpg"
---

Nail design has a rich history that dates back thousands of years, with its origins rooted in ancient civilizations.  The art of nail design has evolved significantly over the years, influenced by cultural trends, fashion, and technological advancements. 

In ancient Egypt, both men and women adorned their nails with henna, a practice that symbolized wealth and status. The use of nail polish can be traced back to the Ming Dynasty in China, where a mixture of beeswax, egg whites, and colored powders was used to create beautiful nail colors.

As the centuries progressed, nail design became more sophisticated. The introduction of modern nail polish in the 20th century revolutionized the industry, allowing for a wider variety of colors and finishes. Today, nail design is not just a beauty trend but a form of self-expression, with techniques ranging from simple manicures to intricate nail art.

At HA Beauty, we celebrate the art of nail design by offering a range of services that highlight the beauty and creativity of our clients. Our skilled technicians are trained in the latest techniques and trends, ensuring that every client leaves feeling beautiful and confident.

File: src/app/posts/[slug]/page.tsx

import { Metadata } from "next";
import { notFound } from "next/navigation";
import { getAllPosts, getPostBySlug } from "@/lib/api";
import { CMS_NAME } from "@/lib/constants";
import markdownToHtml from "@/lib/markdownToHtml";
import Container from "@/app/_components/container";
import Header from "@/app/_components/header";
import { PostBody } from "@/app/_components/post-body";
import { PostHeader } from "@/app/_components/post-header";

export default async function Post(props: Params) {
  const params = await props.params;
  const post = getPostBySlug(params.slug);

  if (!post) {
    return notFound();
  }

  const content = await markdownToHtml(post.content || "");

  return (
    <main>
      <Container>
        <Header />
        <article className="mb-32">
          <PostHeader
            title={post.title}
            coverImage={post.coverImage}
            date={post.date}
            author={post.author}
          />
          <PostBody content={content} />
        </article>
      </Container>
    </main>
  );
}

import cn from "classnames";
import Link from "next/link";
import Image from "next/image";

type Props = {
  title: string;
  src: string;
  slug?: string;
};

const CoverImage = ({ title, src, slug }: Props) => {
  const image = (
    <Image
      src={src}
      alt={`Cover Image for ${title}`}
      className={cn("shadow-sm w-full", {
        "hover:shadow-lg transition-shadow duration-200": slug,
      })}
      width={1300}
      height={630}
    />
  );
  return (
    <div className="sm:mx-0">
      {slug ? (
        <Link href={`/posts/${slug}`} aria-label={title}>
          {image}
        </Link>
      ) : (
        image
      )}
    </div>
  );
};

export default CoverImage;

import { parseISO, format } from "date-fns";

type Props = {
  dateString: string;
};

const DateFormatter = ({ dateString }: Props) => {
  const date = parseISO(dateString);
  return <time dateTime={dateString}>{format(date, "LLLL	d, yyyy")}</time>;
};

export default DateFormatter;

import Avatar from "@/app/_components/avatar";
import CoverImage from "@/app/_components/cover-image";
import { type Author } from "@/interfaces/author";
import Link from "next/link";
import DateFormatter from "./date-formatter";

type Props = {
  title: string;
  coverImage: string;
  date: string;
  excerpt: string;
  author: Author;
  slug: string;
};

export function HeroPost({
  title,
  coverImage,
  date,
  excerpt,
  author,
  slug,
}: Props) {
  return (
    <section>
      <div className="mb-8 md:mb-16">
        <CoverImage title={title} src={coverImage} slug={slug} />
      </div>
      <div className="md:grid md:grid-cols-2 md:gap-x-16 lg:gap-x-8 mb-20 md:mb-28">
        <div>
          <h3 className="mb-4 text-4xl lg:text-5xl leading-tight">
            <Link href={`/posts/${slug}`} className="hover:underline">
              {title}
            </Link>
          </h3>
          <div className="mb-4 md:mb-0 text-lg">
            <DateFormatter dateString={date} />
          </div>
        </div>
        <div>
          <p className="text-lg leading-relaxed mb-4">{excerpt}</p>
          <Avatar name={author.name} picture={author.picture} />
        </div>
      </div>
    </section>
  );
}

import { remark } from ""remark"";
import html from ""remark-html"";

export default async function markdownToHtml(markdown: string) {
  const result = await remark().use(html).process(markdown);
  return result.toString();
}

### Issue Details:
Content of 'issue-description.txt':
# Issue Title: Update Typography and Design Elements in `layout.tsx` and `cover-image.tsx` to Replace Font, Modify Colors, and Add Rounded Corners to Images

## Objective:

Update the typography and design elements by replacing the font, modifying layout colors, and adding rounded corners to images. This will enhance the overall user experience by improving readability and aesthetics.

## Story Context:

The current website uses the Inter font, which will be replaced with Quicksand to match a more modern and playful design language for users. Layout colors need to be updated for better contrast, and cover images should have rounded corners for a more contemporary and cohesive appearance. These changes will ensure users have a visually pleasing and accessible experience.

## Technical Requirements:

- **Framework:** Next.js
- **Styling:** Tailwind CSS
- **Language:** TypeScript

## Codebase Changes:

### 1. Modify `layout.tsx`:

- Replace the Inter font with Quicksand by importing it using `next/font/google` and replacing Inter throughout the file.
- Update the background and text colors to the following Tailwind CSS classes:
    - **Background:** `dark:bg-rose-900`
    - **Text:** `dark:text-pink-200`

### 2. Modify `cover-image.tsx`:

- Apply rounded corners to images using Tailwind CSS classes such as `rounded-lg` or `rounded-xl`.

## Implementation Steps:

### 1. Modify `layout.tsx` to Replace Font and Update Colors:

- **Import Quicksand:**

```
import { Quicksand } from "next/font/google";
```

- Replace all instances of Inter with Quicksand in the code.
- Update the color scheme for the layout by adding Tailwind CSS classes:
    - Background: `dark:bg-rose-900'
    - Text: `dark:text-pink-200`

### 2. Modify `cover-image.tsx` to Add Rounded Corners:

- Locate the image element in `cover-image.tsx`.
- Update the `className` property to include rounded corners using Tailwind CSS classes like `rounded-lg` or `rounded-xl`, in addition to the existing ones (e.g., `shadow-sm w-full`), while maintaining the conditional logic for the slug.

## Acceptance Criteria:

- The font is successfully updated to Quicksand in `layout.tsx`.
- The background and text colors are updated to `dark:bg-rose-900` and `dark:text-pink-200`, respectively.
- Cover images in `cover-image.tsx` have rounded corners using Tailwind CSS classes.
- The website’s design is cohesive, responsive, and aligned with modern aesthetics.

## About HA Beauty Lashes

HA Beauty Lashes was established in 2020 in Glienicke Nordbahn, as an extension of the renowned Ha Beauty brand. Our journey began with a passion for enhancing natural beauty through expertly crafted lash extensions. Since our inception, we have dedicated ourselves to providing high-quality lash services that not only beautify but also empower our clients.

Our team of skilled professionals is trained in the latest techniques and trends in lash extensions, ensuring that every client receives personalized care and attention. We believe that every woman deserves to feel beautiful and confident, and our mission is to help them achieve that effortlessly.

At HA Beauty Lashes, we pride ourselves on our commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction. We continuously strive to innovate and improve our services, making us the go-to destination for lash extensions in Glienicke and beyond.

---
title: "The Transformative Power of Lash Extensions"
excerpt: "Explore the transformative power of lash extensions and how they enhance natural beauty."
coverImage: "/assets/blog/preview/cover.jpg"
date: "2024-12-14T05:35:07.322Z"
author:
  name: Hang
  picture: "/assets/blog/authors/hang.png"
ogImage:
  url: "/assets/blog/preview/cover.jpg"
---

Lash extensions have become a revolutionary beauty trend, offering women the opportunity to enhance their natural beauty effortlessly. Since their introduction, lash extensions have transformed the way women approach their beauty routines, providing a solution for those seeking longer, fuller lashes without the need for mascara.

There are several types of lash extensions available, each designed to cater to different preferences and styles:

1. **Classic Lash Extensions**: These involve applying a single extension to each natural lash, creating a natural and elegant look.
2. **Volume Lash Extensions**: This technique uses multiple lightweight extensions to create a fuller, more dramatic effect, perfect for those who desire a bolder look.
3. **Hybrid Lash Extensions**: A combination of classic and volume techniques, offering a balanced look that suits various eye shapes and styles.

At HA Beauty, we pride ourselves on our expertise in lash extensions. Our trained professionals ensure that each application is done with precision and care, allowing our clients to enjoy stunning, long-lasting results. We also provide essential aftercare tips to maintain the longevity of your lash extensions, ensuring that you can enjoy your beautiful lashes for weeks to come.

Our mission is to empower women through beauty, helping them feel confident and radiant with every blink.

excerpt: "Everything you need to know about lash extensions, trends, and professional insights."
coverImage: "/assets/blog/preview/cover.jpg"
date: "2024-12-12T05:35:07.322Z"
author:
  name: Hang
  picture: "/assets/blog/authors/hang.png"
ogImage:
  url: "/assets/blog/preview/cover.jpg"
---
## The Comprehensive Guide to Lash Extensions

Lash extensions have become a popular beauty trend, offering a way to enhance the length and volume of natural lashes. This guide will provide you with everything you need to know about lash extensions, including the different types, application techniques, and aftercare tips.

### Types of Lash Extensions

1. **Classic Lash Extensions**: These are individual lashes applied to each natural lash, providing a natural look.
2. **Volume Lash Extensions**: Multiple lightweight lashes are applied to each natural lash, creating a fuller and more dramatic effect.
3. **Hybrid Lash Extensions**: A mix of classic and volume techniques, offering a balanced look.

### Application Techniques

The application of lash extensions should always be performed by a trained professional to ensure safety and optimal results. The process typically involves:

- A consultation to determine the desired look.
- Preparation of the natural lashes.
- Application of the extensions using a specialized adhesive.

### Trends in Lash Extensions

As the beauty industry evolves, so do the trends in lash extensions. Some current trends include:

- **Colored Lash Extensions**: Adding a pop of color to your lashes for a fun and unique look.
- **Lash Lifts**: A treatment that curls and lifts natural lashes without extensions, providing a more natural enhancement.

### Professional Insights

To maintain the longevity of your lash extensions, proper aftercare is essential. Here are some tips:

- Avoid water and steam for the first 24 hours after application.
- Use oil-free makeup removers.
- Schedule regular touch-ups every 2-3 weeks to keep your lashes looking their best.

At HA Beauty Lashes, we are committed to providing our clients with the best lash extension services and education. Our goal is to help you achieve stunning, effortless beauty that lasts.

---
title: "The Art of Nail Design"
excerpt: "Discover the rich history and business origins of nail design."
coverImage: "/assets/blog/preview/cover.jpg"
date: "2024-12-14T05:35:07.322Z"
author:
  name: Hang
  picture: "/assets/blog/authors/hang.png"
ogImage:
  url: "/assets/blog/preview/cover.jpg"
---

Nail design has a rich history that dates back thousands of years, with its origins rooted in ancient civilizations.  The art of nail design has evolved significantly over the years, influenced by cultural trends, fashion, and technological advancements. 

In ancient Egypt, both men and women adorned their nails with henna, a practice that symbolized wealth and status. The use of nail polish can be traced back to the Ming Dynasty in China, where a mixture of beeswax, egg whites, and colored powders was used to create beautiful nail colors.

As the centuries progressed, nail design became more sophisticated. The introduction of modern nail polish in the 20th century revolutionized the industry, allowing for a wider variety of colors and finishes. Today, nail design is not just a beauty trend but a form of self-expression, with techniques ranging from simple manicures to intricate nail art.

At HA Beauty, we celebrate the art of nail design by offering a range of services that highlight the beauty and creativity of our clients. Our skilled technicians are trained in the latest techniques and trends, ensuring that every client leaves feeling beautiful and confident.

import { Metadata } from "next";
import { notFound } from "next/navigation";
import { getAllPosts, getPostBySlug } from "@/lib/api";
import { CMS_NAME } from "@/lib/constants";
import markdownToHtml from "@/lib/markdownToHtml";
import Container from "@/app/_components/container";
import Header from "@/app/_components/header";
import { PostBody } from "@/app/_components/post-body";
import { PostHeader } from "@/app/_components/post-header";

export default async function Post(props: Params) {
  const params = await props.params;
  const post = getPostBySlug(params.slug);

  if (!post) {
    return notFound();
  }

  const content = await markdownToHtml(post.content || "");

  return (
    <main>
      <Container>
        <Header />
        <article className="mb-32">
          <PostHeader
            title={post.title}
            coverImage={post.coverImage}
            date={post.date}
            author={post.author}
          />
          <PostBody content={content} />
        </article>
      </Container>
    </main>
  );
}

import cn from "classnames";
import Link from "next/link";
import Image from "next/image";

type Props = {
  title: string;
  src: string;
  slug?: string;
};

const CoverImage = ({ title, src, slug }: Props) => {
  const image = (
    <Image
      src={src}
      alt={`Cover Image for ${title}`}
      className={cn("shadow-sm w-full", {
        "hover:shadow-lg transition-shadow duration-200": slug,
      })}
      width={1300}
      height={630}
    />
  );
  return (
    <div className="sm:mx-0">
      {slug ? (
        <Link href={`/posts/${slug}`} aria-label={title}>
          {image}
        </Link>
      ) : (
        image
      )}
    </div>
  );
};

export default CoverImage;

import { parseISO, format } from "date-fns";

type Props = {
  dateString: string;
};

const DateFormatter = ({ dateString }: Props) => {
  const date = parseISO(dateString);
  return <time dateTime={dateString}>{format(date, "LLLL	d, yyyy")}</time>;
};

export default DateFormatter;

import Avatar from "@/app/_components/avatar";
import CoverImage from "@/app/_components/cover-image";
import { type Author } from "@/interfaces/author";

type Props = {

  date: string;
  excerpt: string;
  author: Author;

};

export function HeroPost({
  title,
  coverImage,
  date,

        <div>
          <h3 className="mb-4 text-4xl lg:text-5xl leading-tight">
            <Link href={`/posts/${slug}`} className="hover:underline">
              {title}
            </Link>
          </h3>
          <div className="mb-4 md:mb-0 text-lg">
            <DateFormatter dateString={date} />
          </div>
        </div>
        <div>
          <p className="text-lg leading-relaxed mb-4">{excerpt}</p>
          <Avatar name={author.name} picture={author.picture} />
        </div>
      </div>
    </section>
  );
}
